events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Senior Software Engineer role and the resume looks promising with relevant tech stack experience.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate's background as a software developer and experience with cloud technologies.
A dedicated recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process for better communication and follow-up.
Initial phone screening completed successfully; candidate demonstrated strong understanding of software architecture and cloud platforms relevant to our projects.
Candidate responded promptly and is enthusiastic about participating in the next stage of technical interviews, confirming availability for a slot next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-24 at 14:00 UTC with the engineering panel to assess coding and system design skills.
